title: She Leaves A Little Sparkle Vinyl Wall Decal
features: What are Vinyl Decals? A material that is made very thin and flexible. The backing has a light adhesive to be easily installed on any smooth non-porous surface.

What types of surfaces can your Vinyl be applied to? Our Vinyl can be applied to any clean, smooth, and non-porus surface. They can not be applied to heavily textured surfaces, brick, stucco, concrete, or rock like surfaces.

Do Vinyl Quote's or Designs come with a background? No. Vinyl lettering you received (unless noted) will NOT contain any background. Vinyl lays on a backing paper as individual letters to be adhered to your surface. Lettering will not be individually applied however. It will arrive in one full piece as shown in picture displayed.
Is the Vinyl removable and reusable? Our Vinyl is removable but NOT reusable.

Modern Vector Statement and Copyright We are not responsible for any misuse of our vinyl decals. Keep all vinyl decals out of the reach of infants and children. ALL DESIGNS ARE MADE BY MODERN VECTOR . DO NOT COPY ANY DESIGNS OR ARTWORK IN THIS STORE. I DO NOT OWN QUOTES, BUT I DO OWN THE DESIGN IN WHICH THEY ARE PORTRAYED IN MY STORE. I HAVE COPYRIGHTS ON ALL OF MY DESIGNS IN THIS STORE. Proper repercussion will follow if Modern Vector designs are being sold without permission.
description: She Leaves A Little Sparkle Wherever She Goes Quote Vinyl Wall Decal
